thread.title: Rio 2016: No viral testing of sewage-filled Olympic waters
thread.title_full: Rio 2016: No viral testing of sewage-filled Olympic waters

title: Rio 2016: No viral testing of sewage-filled Olympic waters
text: > Sports Rio 2016: No viral testing of sewage-filled Olympic waters FILE - In this Feb. 25, 2015 file photo, dead fish and trash float in the polluted Guanabara Bay in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Rio de Janeiro's Olympic organizing committee ruled out conducting viral tests of the human sewage-laden waterways where the 2016 Games' aquatic events will be held, following recommendations from the World Health Organization, Rio 2016 spokesman Mario Andrada said Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. (AP Photo/Leo Correa, File)
